item.title: U.S. to offer migrant teens $2,500 if they voluntarily leave the country
item.description: The U.S. government is planning to give migrant teenagers a $2,500 stipend if they choose to return to their home countries voluntarily.

item.title: Hamas says it has agreed to parts of the Gaza peace proposal outlined by Trump
item.description: The plan called for Hamas to return all Israeli hostages and for the Israeli military to begin withdrawing from parts of the Gaza Strip in phases.

item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs sentenced to over 4 years for prostitution-related charges
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs' sentencing hearing was held three months after he was convicted â€‹on two prostitution-related charges.

item.title: 8-year sentence for plot to kill Supreme Court Justice Brett Kavanaugh
item.description: Sophie Roske, who was charged under a male name, pleaded guilty in April to attempting to kill or kidnap a Supreme Court justice.

item.title: How to buy gold and silver
item.description: If you're looking to add gold and silver as assets to your portfolio, there are a few ways to get started.
